name: Covert Security and Defensive Measures
description: Defensive strategies for personal security, asset protection, and counter-surveillance operations.

cards.title: Developing Tactical Situational Awareness
cards.description: Recognizing and responding to threats before they escalate.
bulletpoints: Detecting anomalies in social and environmental settings.
Analyzing behavioral cues to predict hostile intentions.
Preemptive threat assessment and rapid response training.

cards.title: Security Protocols and Defensive Maneuvers
cards.description: Establishing proactive measures to mitigate threats.
bulletpoints: Implementing perimeter defense and access control.
Developing rapid deployment strategies for high-risk situations.
Understanding legal and tactical implications of self-defense.

cards.title: Counter-Surveillance and Infiltration Prevention
cards.description: Identifying and neutralizing surveillance and tracking attempts.
bulletpoints: Detecting and evading digital and physical surveillance.
Securing communications and data from cyber intrusions.
